description.narrative: The development objective of the project is to contribute to the improvement of performance, efficiency, and transparency of public resources management in Mauritania.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall create a cross-cutting entity responsible for environmental management.
The Recipient shall formally approve the National Action Plan for Environment.
The Recipient shall organize and invite the Association to participate in a mission for the assessment of the capacity ofministries involved in the project implementation, in the area of procurement.

title.narrative: The dedicated structure recommended by the NEAP is implemented.

comment.narrative: CONTINUE - Ministry of Environment established: Yes/No

title.narrative: The issuance of orders of payment is delegated to sector ministries through RACHAD, in accordance with adopted norms and regulations.

comment.narrative: CONTINUE - Number of Ministries where payment orders are issued through RACHAD

title.narrative: There is an increased number of Sector Ministries using the RACHAD software for the management of their budget.

comment.narrative: CONTINUE - Number of sector ministries using RACHAD software for the management of their budget

title.narrative: The Fiscal and Accounting Reports are produced timely and in accordance with the legislation.

comment.narrative: Achieved.Yes (Annual TOFE, Treasury balance product and Annual Budget Execution Law adopted

title.narrative: The National Environment Action Plan (NEAP) is officially approved by the Government.
Tax office is equipped with a computerized revenue management tool.

comment.narrative: Under finalization. Final acceptance is scheduled for March 25.

actual.value: It will most likely become Yes by March 29.

comment.narrative: Under finalization. Final acceptance is scheduled for March 25.

title.narrative: The new computerized HRM system is developed and implemented.

comment.narrative: Under finalization. Final acceptance will be received by March 25.

actual.value: It will most likely become Yes by March 29.

comment.narrative: Under finalization. Final acceptance will be received by March 25.

title.narrative: The new legislation on Human Resources Management is adopted and implemented

comment.narrative: Legislation related to civil service special status and salary grid partially adopted

target.value: Yes - Secondary legislation and regulation adopted

comment.narrative: 3 out of 4 legislations are approved and implemented. (Legislation related to the new evaluation system remain.)
3 out of 4 legislations are approved and implemented. (Legislation related to the new evaluation system remain.)
Achieved. Tax collection is significantly improved following the fiscal census.
Achieved. Tax collection is significantly improved following the fiscal census.

title.narrative: INDICATOR #5: Public Procurement executed in compliance with the adopted institutional procurement plans.

comment.narrative: NEW - Number of ministries executing their procurement in compliance with their procurement plan

title.narrative: Capacity building for Ministry of Environment staff on conducting environmental impact studies.

comment.narrative: NEW - Number of staff trained on conducting environmental impact studies

title.narrative: INDICATOR #2: Budget execution is improved through a more efficient payment process at Treasury.

comment.narrative: NEW - Payment executed in number of hours
Achieved - Interconnection between treasury and central BK is completed on January 2014. Payment duration was reduced by half.
Achieved - Interconnection between treasury and central BK is completed on January 2014. Payment duration was reduced by half.

title.narrative: INDICATOR #6: There is a decreasing percentage of single source contracting.

comment.narrative: NEW - Single source contracting as % of total
The last available statistics date 2012. Single source contracting rate has not been officially published since 2011.

title.narrative: An increasing number of staff from Ministry of Interior is trained to support the decentralization process to Municipalities.
An increasing number of institutions is operational and carry out duties, as defined by the new procurement code.

baseline.value: March 2012: The Regulatory Authority and the National Control Commission are staffed and carry out their duties

target.value: Commission for Social Sectors is also staffed and carries out duties.

comment.narrative: Achieved. All sectoral commissions are staffed and functional.

title.narrative: Civil servant census is validated by inter-ministerial committee
INDICATOR #4: Percentage of civil servants effectively monitored by the Ministry of Civil Service.

comment.narrative: REVISED - % of civil servants registered in and monitored through HR system
The integrated HR management system which captures all civil servants is under finalization and final acceptance will be receivedby March 25, 2014.
The integrated HR management system which captures all civil servants is under finalization and final acceptance will be receivedby March 25.

title.narrative: INDICATOR #1: Budget preparation is improved through enhanced linking with policy priorities.

comment.narrative: REVISED - Number of ministries preparing the budget in line with MTEF

title.narrative: Network connection between Treasury and Central Bank is in place.

comment.narrative: Achieved - Inter-conenction is completed on January 2, 2014.
